name: smudgily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has no particular shape and no clear edges: We were smudgily reflected back in the glass, through dabs of light. She gathered together the smudgily photocopied prints, and handed them over.
More examplesFewer examplesThe logo was stamped smudgily, looking very much like a bad fake.I found the recipe in a small, smudgily printed magazine in my mother's kitchen.The tower was smudgily visible on the horizon.They were handing out smudgily printed leaflets to passers-by.
